AmbitionBox.Name: The official or commonly known business name of the company.
AmbitionBox.Industry: The sector or category of business operations the company is primarily engaged in.
AmbitionBox.Headquarter: The city, state/region, and country where the company's main office is located.
AmbitionBox.Ownership: Indicates if the company is publicly traded (Public) or privately held (Private).
AmbitionBox.Foundation Year: The year when the company was established or officially founded, often including age.
